td.content: s:pt complained of moderate retrosternal chest pain, moderate heart burn and severe regurgitation. pt denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. pt is a 72 year old male. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 84.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.
